#Text=6.0 magnitude earthquake rocks eastern Turkey
#Text=Tuesday , March 9 , 2010
#Text=Location of Elazig province in Turkey
#Text=A 6.0-magnitude earthquake struck Basyurt , in the Elazig province or eastern Turkey at 04:32 AM ( 02:32 GMT ) on Monday .
#Text=According to local Kandilli observatory , the quake struck at a depth of five kilometres ; the epicenter was near Karakocan town in the same province .
#Text=The pre-dawn earthquake killed at least 40 people and almost 100 were injured .
#Text=The village of Okcular was worst hit , claimed the press secretary for the provincial governor , Ozcan Yalcin .

#Text=According to the U.S. Geological Survey , nearly five hours later , a magnitude-5.5 aftershock hit the province . 40 other aftershocks followed shortly , the highest of them being 4.4 magnitude , according to sources .

#Text=While no deaths were immediately reported , the government 's crisis management center soon put the toll at seventeen with another 60 injured according to the officials at Ankara , the capital .
#Text=It was soon confirmed that at least 39 were dead ; the toll is expected to rise .
#Text=At least four of the victims were children .
#Text=Muammer Erol , the provincial governor of Elazig , stated Okcular , Yukari Kanatli and Kayali accounted for majority of the dead .
#Text=He told CNN Turk that " villages consisting mainly of mud-brick houses have been damaged , but we have minimal damage such as cracks in buildings made of cement or stone " .
#Text=Okcular , the largest of the affected villages , accounted for at least seventeen of the dead .
#Text=The village has a population of 800 , and the majority of the dwellers live in mud-brick homes built on hillsides .
#Text=About 25 to 30 houses were demolished in this village .
#Text=" The village is totally flattened , " Hasan Demirdag , local administrator , told NTV .
#Text=Yadin Apaydin , the administrator of Yukari Kanatli , said his village had been severely affected .
#Text=" Everything has been knocked down - there is not a stone in place , " he told CNN ' s Turkey sister network , CNN Türk .
#Text=" Many houses have collapsed .
